script.name: Instructional Methods: Import
script.description:
Import instructional methods from a CSV file.
Each line contains a subject area, a course number, a CRN, and an instructional method reference.

Example:
    Subj,Course,CRN  ,IM
AAE ,69000 ,11170,DO
AAE ,56800 ,11166,DO
AT  ,48700 ,18619,B/H
